detail_desc: Set with a top and shorts in soft organic cotton jersey. Sleeveless, patterned top with a rounded, frill-trimmed hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps, jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide hem. No fasteners.
Long flannel shirt in a checked viscose and cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dog jumper in a soft knit with contrasting colour pompoms on the back, a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Polo-neck collar in a soft cable knit. Fleece lining.
Jersey top with dropped shoulders, long, gathered sleeves and gathers in the side seams for a draped effect.
Straight-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool and some alpaca wool. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lined, non-wired triangular bikini top. Cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps with a metal decoration at the front. The shoulder straps can be undone at the back and fastened in various ways. No fasteners.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, 3/4-length sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft ribbed jersey.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Checked shirt in a woven cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with flounced trims and an elasticated seam and detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Gently flared top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
A pair of snake-shaped hoop earrings made from recycled zinc decorated with glass rhinestones.

Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with lace details. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and long, wide sleeves with lace trims.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 90x90 cm.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Cropped jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood and zip down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in a ribbed viscose blend with a round neck and short sleeves.
Cardigan in quilted jersey with a zip down the front, small stand-up collar with a press-stud, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Trainers in cotton canvas with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Short, wide dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a small, frilled collar, V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top and a gathered yoke at the back. Long puff sleeves, wide cuffs with covered buttons, a seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Partly lined in satin.
Short sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves, wide elastication at the hem and reflective details. Seamless.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined, ribbed, textured swimsuit with a low-cut back and shoulder straps with decorative plastic buckles.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Pull-on trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, a back pocket and tapered legs.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and button at the cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

5-pocket, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crêpe weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Metal body chain that fastens around the neck and waist. Adjustable length.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a bleached pattern and rubber text print on the front.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a square neckline and long puff sleeves.
Gently tailored jacket in a linen and viscose weave with narrow notch lapels, discreet side pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with gathered seams. No fasteners. Lined.
Leggings in lightweight cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist and zip fly.
Thin metal chain necklace with a round, hammered pendant. Adjustable length, 47-53 cm.
Small suede bag with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap, zip at the top and an inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5.5x17x24.5 cm.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Long, straight-cut top in sturdy wool that can also be worn as outerwear. Double-layered, ribbed stand-up collar, a zip at the top and low dropped shoulders. Extra-long sleeves with wide, lined, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded, tape-trimmed hem. Longer at the back.

Shirt in washed cotton denim with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a gently rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Braided cotton thread bracelets in adjustable widths.
V-neck blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with gently dropped shoulders and 3/4-length puff sleeves with a frill trim. Gathered, softly draping yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Scarf in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Vest top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with decorative buttons down the front.
Lace-knit jumper in a soft mohair blend in a slightly shorter style with long, slightly wider arms and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and a print motif on one leg.
Socks in a soft, fine, fluffy knit containing glittery threads. Elasticated at the top.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with a shawl collar with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.
Romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Press-studs down the front and one leg, and full feet with elasticated heels.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
A sheet of self-adhesive stickers in various sizes and designs.
Lace shortie briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and medium coverage at the back.
Hoodie in soft, warming faux shearling with a lined hood and zip at the top. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.

Dungarees in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Straps with adjustable buttoning, concealed press-studs at the crotch and ribbed hems. Soft jersey lining at the top. The cotton content of the dungarees is organic.
Short, sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and narrow, detachable tie belt at the waist. Jersey lining.
Long top in soft sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins, a wrapover hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with an open chest pocket and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Tops with short sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 1½-4Y). Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Longer cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some alpaca wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Baby Exclusive. Polo-neck collar in soft, rib-knit wool.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Dress in patterned cotton chambray with a collar, button placket with a pleat below and a chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Detachable imitation suede belt. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details in a slightly looser fit. Regular waist, button fly, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Top in soft pile with an embroidered motif on the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Two pairs of leggings in different colours of washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets. One pair with an all-over print.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
